overview: Blake Bush has over 20 years of team management and media development experience. After graduating from the University of Texas with a degree in Radio-TV-Film, Blake worked at Human Code where he served first as the Director of Visual Media and then as the VP of Production. After Human Code was acquired, Blake co-founded Amaze Entertainment’s Fizz Factor Games where he served as the Production/Animation Director as well as a Project Art Lead. At Enspire, Blake is committed to nurturing a collaborative environment where talented designers work together to create highly engaging learning experiences for all types of learners.
